text: Hey both! This is not currently supported in email due to limitations with how emails are rendered. We have a limited private beta in place which allows this and more. You can request access to via your CSM.

I can't seem to get the list of products in one of my portals with `crm_objects`. I'm using the exact same code I've used successfully in other portals, and I have several products in the portal, crm_objects just... isn't returning anything. My code is this:
```{% set query = crm_objects("product", "&limit=100&offset=0") %}
{{ query|tojson }}```
And the output is just `{"results":[],"hasMore":false,"offset":0,"total":0}`
I don't really have any idea what's going on. I've also tried getting other objects on a passworded page, and it's the same. I've also tried a bunch of combinations of filters. Does anyone know what I might be doing wrong?
Sounds like a :bug:, <@UU9U51TJ6> maybe you can help out?

Just an update in case others run into this issue: there’s a bug in CRM search where a product property called `type` will prevent products from being returned. If you’ve made a product property called `type`, deleting it should resolve this while the team fixes the underlying issue.
